    • Method Detail

      • getDisbursementsInGroup

        public java.util.ArrayList<Disbursement> getDisbursementsInGroup(int groupId,
                                                                 java.lang.String email)
                                                          throws java.sql.SQLException
        Fetches a list of disbursements in a group, where the user is a participant of the disbursement
        Parameters:
        groupId - The id of the group to get disbursements from.
        email - The email of the user.
        Returns:
        An ArrayList of Disbursements, without participants or items.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • getDisbursementDetails

        public Disbursement getDisbursementDetails(int disbursementId,
                                           java.lang.String email)
                                    throws java.sql.SQLException
        Fetches the participants and items in a given disbursement, if the user is one of the participants.
        Parameters:
        disbursementId - The id of the disbursement to fetch.
        email - The id of the user.
        Returns:
        The Disbursement, with complete data including items and participants.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • deleteDisbursement

        public boolean deleteDisbursement(Disbursement disbursement)
                           throws java.sql.SQLException
        Deletes a Disbursement
        Parameters:
        disbursement - the Disbursement to delete
        Returns:
        true if deletion is successful, false if unsuccessful
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - with a description of where it happened and origin exception.

      • addDisbursement

        public boolean addDisbursement(Disbursement disbursement,
                               int groupid)
                        throws java.sql.SQLException
        Adds a Disbursement to the given group. Does not commit anything to the database unless all parts of the disbursement are succesfully inserted.
        Parameters:
        disbursement - Disbursement to add.
        groupid - Id of the group the disbursement belongs.
        Returns:
        true if successful, @{code false} if not successful.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - in case of error in statements or connection.

      • updateBalances

        public boolean updateBalances(Disbursement disbursement,
                              int groupid)
                       throws java.sql.SQLException
        Method to update the balances in the DB
        Parameters:
        disbursement - Contains the information about who participated and the sum
        groupid - which group to update in
        Returns:
        boolean to tell if the transaction was successful.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • respondToDisbursement

        public boolean respondToDisbursement(Disbursement disbursement,
                                     int groupId,
                                     java.lang.String email,
                                     int response)
                              throws java.sql.SQLException
        Method that registres the response of the participants
        Parameters:
        disbursement - contains info of the disbursement
        groupId - wich group it belongs to
        email - the responder
        response - the response. 1 is accepted and 2 is declined
        Returns:
        boolean to tell if the transaction was successful.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException
